summary: This is an email from Mark L. Epstein to an unspecified recipient (IIMMMIR), with Stacey Richman copied, regarding forwarding something to Kevin Ponder. The email includes an image attachment and appears to be a brief communication about document transmission.

persons.name: Mark L. Epstein
persons.context: Appears as the sender of this email correspondence, using a mindspring.com email address.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Copied on the email, identified with an email address suggesting a law practice (srichmanlaw@msn.com).

persons.name: Kevin Ponder
persons.context: Named as the intended recipient of a forwarded item in the email subject line.

connections.description: Mark Epstein copies Stacey Richman on an email, indicating some form of communication or shared interest.
Mark Epstein is arranging to forward something to Kevin Ponder, as indicated in the email subject.

events.title: Email correspondence regarding forwarding
events.description: Mark L. Epstein sends an email about forwarding an item (possibly an image file IMG_1301.JPG) to Kevin Ponder.

keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein, using a mindspring.com email, sent an email on May 26, 2020.
The email's subject indicates an intent to forward something to Kevin Ponder.
Attorney Stacey Richman was copied on the correspondence.
